price: 11. Kaadu Nabii Muusah ina Muusa weeqaytut qidde waqdi kay maqanxak kaa katayaay, kaak abaanam wagit teetik itte, tokkel kay maqanxa xer ikkek kaa abaluk kaa katatte usun (firqawnaa kee firqawni mara kinnuk) aaxige kalah.
arabic: وَقَالَتۡ لِأُخۡتِهِۦ قُصِّيهِۖ فَبَصُرَتۡ بِهِۦ عَن جُنُبٖ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālat li-ukh'tihi quṣṣīhi fabaṣurat bihi ʿan junubin wahum lā yashʿurūna
